channel.title: Another Poll - King, Scorned and Whispers
channel.description: Boslof on discord: > Here's a new poll. Some stuff about King, whispers, and Scorned. https://goo.gl/forms/qS7K8LJvrAZAZ5Fu2

item.title: Another Poll - King, Scorned and Whispers
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Also, scorned shouldn’t have a double win con since it would allow it to escape one of them. And having the generic NE goal would kind of defeat its purpose, which is to make investigative claims suspicious.

Read full topic
item.source: Another Poll - King, Scorned and Whispers

item.title: Another Poll - King, Scorned and Whispers
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
RHCube:

And allowing to target king wouldn’t be a huge buff.

As long as it doesn’t mean forcing the king to finger, then I’m fine tbh. I kinda assumed Burrito meant he could make king vote and double vote… I should probably sleep tbh

Read full topic

The NK’s are in a good spot(Sorc might need a nerf though, but thats just me)

All non-poss NKs need a buff. They should have a 15% win rate. And allowing to target king wouldn’t be a huge buff.

But buffing the possessor is the easiest. Just let him control the King

The Possessor doesn’t needs another buff. he has a way to win a 2v1, better than the reaper. The NK’s are in a good spot(Sorc might need a nerf though, but thats just me)

item.title: Another Poll - King, Scorned and Whispers
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Oh and I just did the math.

Odds of GK * Odds of not starting apostle * odds of noble convert (assuming only one can spawn which is obviously false) = 0.48306

Which is surprising because that means it has ~52% chance of one of those failure conditions happening as is

Read full topic

item.title: Another Poll - King, Scorned and Whispers
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Here’s a possible solution: My Noble and aristocrat rework
It would discourage whispering to a single player while not making king boring or destroying whispers in general.

Read full topic
item.source: Another Poll - King, Scorned and Whispers

item.title: Another Poll - King, Scorned and Whispers
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
That doesn’t fix the problem with whispers though, which is when people only whisper one player. That would just discourage whispering to multiple players, which should be encouraged and not discouraged

Read full topic
item.source: Another Poll - King, Scorned and Whispers

item.title: Another Poll - King, Scorned and Whispers
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Whispers to or from the king should never be disabled. Being able to whisper is the only thing that makes king fun, it would be boring if the king couldn’t send or receive whispers. And limiting whispers is also not the correct solution. The problem with whispers is when people only whisper one player, not whispers in general. This would still happen if whispers were limited(and it would discourage all types of whispering). Find another solution(like adding more abilities to read whispers).

Read full topic
item.source: Another Poll - King, Scorned and Whispers
